FuncDef: The display eth-trunk troubleshooting command displays reasons for Eth-Trunk interface failures. The display eth-trunk troubleshooting command displays reasons for Eth-Trunk interface failures.
ExtraInfo: If an Eth-Trunk interface has a failure, such as a negotiation failure or status flapping, run the display eth-trunk troubleshooting command to check the failure reasons. The command output helps locate the failure and maintain the device.
